text: Hypercourt is a commune in the department of Somme, northern France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of Pertain (the seat), Hyencourt-le-Grand and Omiécourt.Arrêté préfectoral 25 May 2016 == See also == *Communes of the Somme department == References == Category:Communes of Somme (department) Category:Populated places established in 2017
title: Hypercourt
